commit.message:
configure: Rebuilt.

2000-01-18  Bryce McKinlay <bryce@albatross.co.nz>

	* configure: Rebuilt.
	* configure.in: Recognize --disable-interpreter.

From-SVN: r31496

files.patch:

+
